properties.Name: PurchaseOrderLine

Columns.Name: PoNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Purchase Order.

Columns.Name: PoLineItemNumber
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a PO line item.

Columns.Name: Quantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of products to be shipped for this line item.

Columns.Name: DateRequired
Columns.Description: The date that the items are required.

Columns.Name: UnitPrice
Columns.Description: The unit price of the product.

Columns.Name: NegotiatedPrice
Columns.Description: The negotiated price of the associated PO Line Items.

Columns.Name: FreightAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of Freight costs authorized for the associated PO Line Item.

Columns.Name: TaxAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of tax costs authorized for the associated PO Line Item.

Columns.Name: TotalLineItemAmount
Columns.Description: The total value of the associated PO Line Items.

Columns.Name: QualityStandardMeasure
Columns.Description:
The specific Quality Standard parameter applied to the associated PO Line Item.

Example:

PPM (Part Per Million): 100 defects/rejects PPM

Columns.Name: QualityStandardId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Quality Standard.

Columns.Name: ItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier, which is typically used for inventory-related activities.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.

Columns.Name: OrderLineNumber
Columns.Description: The number that identifies the Order Line Item.

Properties.Description: The specific products, goods or services that are identified on the Purchase Order.

properties.Description: The specific products, goods or services that are identified on the Purchase Order.
